member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetCodec
member.summary: Gets the codec associated with the video encoder.
member.returns: The value from the enumeration specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetCodecConfiguration
member.summary: Gets the codec configuration parameters associated with the video encoder.
member.param: Receives a structure representing the codec configuration parameters specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetCodecProfile
member.summary: Gets the codec profile associated with the video encoder.
member.param: Receives a structure representing the codec profile specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetEncoderFlags
member.summary: Gets the encoder flags with which the video encoder was initialized.
member.returns: The bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetInputFormat
member.summary: Gets the input format of the video encoder.
member.returns: The value specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetMaxMotionEstimationPrecision
member.summary: Gets the maximum motion estimation precision of the video encoder.
member.returns: The value from the enumeration specified in the passed into .

member.name: ID3D12VideoEncoder.GetNodeMask
member.summary: Gets the node mask for the video encoder.
member.returns: The node mask value specified in the passed into .
